name: ManuSpec Company MS7125 5minute Steel Putty
description: MS7125 5minute Steel Putty, is a two part, epoxy compound that cures quickly at room temperature. MS7125 5minute Steel Putty is designed for Bridging large gaps or holes and Vertical surface applications. The mix ratio of MS7125 5minute Steel Putty resin to hardener is 100:60 by weight and 1:1 by volume.
